name: Buglings: Against the Void
description:
Buglings is a prototype created during the Epic Game Jam.

You play as the defender of the core. Bug-creatures are trying to destroy your energy source. You have to defend the core as long as possible. 

With every bug you kill you gather fragments and items. Items will improve your stats. Fragments can be used to build new tiles but you are limited to build upon your remaining fields. Every additional tile you build will strengthen the field.

(Planned and partially implemented but not working)

You can build turrets on your remaining fields with the fragments you gathered.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Attack: Left Click
Building: E (Confirm with Left Click)
